function.name: windStrengthMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the wind strength mode of a fan or air conditioner.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the wind strength mode.

predefinedWindStrengthMode.description: The predefined wind strength mode to set (e.g., strong wind, mild wind, weak wind).
